import React from 'react' import {Link, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {useAuth} from '../contexts/Auth' function Navbar() { const { signOut } = useAuth() const navigate = useNavigate() async function handleSignOut() { await signOut() navigate('/login') } return (
